ValidationRule.description: The Preferred Contact Method and related method of contact need to be filled out
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
IF( ISNEW () && NOT(Ispickval(LeadSource,"Online Application Form"))&& OR ( And ( ISPICKVAL(Preferred_Contact_Method__c, "Mobile"), ISBLANK(MobilePhone) ),
AND ( ISPICKVAL(Preferred_Contact_Method__c, "Home Phone"), ISBLANK(Home_Phone__c) ),
AND ( ISPICKVAL(Preferred_Contact_Method__c, "Email"), ISBLANK(Email) ),
AND ( ISPICKVAL(Preferred_Contact_Method__c, "Business phone"), ISBLANK(Business_Phone__c) )) , TRUE, FALSE)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Preferred Contact Method and related method of contact need to be filled out
